verses.verse: ( The Fool Says There Is No God) ( 230 53:1-6 ;  290 59:1-17 ;  520 3:9-20 ) לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster. לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ Of David. אָ֘מַ֤ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says נָבָ֣ל <WH5036> nā·ḇāl The fool ( The Hebrew words rendered fool throughout the Psalms denote one who is morally deficient.) בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <WH3820> bə·lib·bōw in his heart, אֵ֣ין <WH369> ’ên “ [There is] no אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God. ” הִֽשְׁחִ֗יתוּ <WH7843> hiš·ḥî·ṯū They are corrupt; הִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ <WH8581> hiṯ·‘î·ḇū are vile. עֲלִילָ֗ה <WH5949> ‘ă·lî·lāh their acts אֵ֣ין <WH369> ’ên There is no עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> ‘ō·śêh- one who does טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> ṭō·wḇ good.

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ <WH8064> miš·šā·ma·yim from heaven הִשְׁקִ֪יף <WH8259> hiš·qîp̄ looks down עַֽל־ <WH5921> ‘al- upon בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> bə·nê- the sons אָ֫דָ֥ם <WH120> ’ā·ḏām of men לִ֭רְאוֹת <WH7200> lir·’ō·wṯ to see הֲיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> hă·yêš if any מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> maś·kîl understand, דֹּ֝רֵשׁ <WH1875> dō·rêš if any seek אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God.

הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> hak·kōl All סָר֮ <WH5493> sār have turned away, יַחְדָּ֪ו <WH3162> yaḥ·dāw they have together נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ <WH444> ne·’ĕ·lā·ḥū become corrupt; ( LXX worthless) אֵ֤ין <WH369> ’ên there is no עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> ‘ō·śêh- one who does ט֑וֹב <WH2896> ṭō·wḇ good, אֵ֝֗ין <WH369> ’ên not גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- even אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> ’e·ḥāḏ one. ( Cited in )

הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> hă·lō never יָדְעוּ֮ <WH3045> yā·ḏə·‘ū learn? כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- ... פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <WH6466> pō·‘ă·lê Will the workers אָ֥וֶן <WH205> ’ā·wen of iniquity אֹכְלֵ֣י <WH398> ’ō·ḵə·lê They devour עַ֭מִּי <WH5971> ‘am·mî my people אָ֣כְלוּ <WH398> ’ā·ḵə·lū [like] לֶ֑חֶם <WH3899> le·ḥem bread; יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD. לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō they refuse קָרָֽאוּ׃ <WH7121> qā·rā·’ū to call upon

שָׁ֤ם׀ <WH8033> šām There they are, פָּ֣חֲדוּ <WH6342> pā·ḥă·ḏū overwhelmed פָ֑חַד <WH6343> p̄ā·ḥaḏ with dread, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- for אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God בְּד֣וֹר <WH1755> bə·ḏō·wr [is] in the company צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> ṣad·dîq of the righteous.

עֲצַת־ <WH6098> ‘ă·ṣaṯ- the plans עָנִ֥י <WH6041> ‘ā·nî of the oppressed, תָבִ֑ישׁוּ <WH954> ṯā·ḇî·šū You [sinners] frustrate כִּ֖י <WH3588> kî yet יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD מַחְסֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4268> maḥ·sê·hū is their shelter.

מִ֥י <WH4310> mî Oh, that יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit·tên would come מִצִּיּוֹן֮ <WH6726> miṣ·ṣî·yō·wn from Zion! יְשׁוּעַ֪ת <WH3444> yə·šū·‘aṯ the salvation יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel בְּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> bə·šūḇ restores יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh When the LORD שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> šə·ḇūṯ His captive עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> ‘am·mōw people, יָגֵ֥ל <WH1523> yā·ḡêl rejoice, יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ let Jacob יִשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> yiś·maḥ be glad! יִשְׂרָֽאֵל׃ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl let Israel
